video.title: Roaring with Pride
video.synopsis: This documentary series captures the journey of a pride of lions bred in captivity as they're transitioned into living in the wilds of Africa.

episodes.synopsis: After two months in the den, the Ngamo cubs venture into the open for the first time. Meanwhile, the MK lions hunt a giraffe and Kwali stalks a zebra.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Kwali struggles to take down a zebra, Milo and Amadi play tug of war, Laili and Lewa encounter a python, and Pazza becomes possessive with a tortoise.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The volunteers try to change things up with the menu, Laili and Lewa stalk an impala after dark, and a zebra fights back against the L lions.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Laili and Lewa confront a pair of defiant zebras, the Ngamo cubs take to the trees, and four newcomer lions are added to the park.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Lewa and Laili take on a kudu, the P lions make a record kill, new cubs inhabit the denning enclosure, and Kwali is bitten on the cheek during a hunt.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Penya and Paza find a python, the D cubs leave the den for the first time, Lewa and Laili chase a zebra, and the C lions tackle a wildebeest.
episodes.title: Episode 6
